about_the_game:
This DLC is free. It contains all the 28 high-quality BGM(.flac) in the game. The music list is as follows:
1.The chant of Galaxy (Erhu)
2.The Dawn of Spring
3.The Banquet of Midsummer
4.The Dormancy of Autumn
5.The Haze of Winter
6.The Long and Remote Huaxia
7.The King's Way
8.My Own Way
9.Art of Deception
10.The Dawn of Spring (Xiao)
11.Everthing in control
12.The Dark Moon
13.Not To Yield A Step
14.The Heavy Spearmen
15.The Ambition of Mengde
16.The mperial Counsellor, Dong
17.Liu, Guan and Zhang
18.The Awe of Huaxia
19.Superior Ma Chao
20.Zhao Zilong of Changshan
21.Debate V2
22.Debate V2
23.The Brocade-Sail Thief
24.Chibi
25.The Dawn of Spring (Violin)
26.Sentimental
27.The chant of Galaxy (Violin)
28.The Land like a Dream

name: Three Kingdoms: The Last Warlord - OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: I3 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX560se or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This DLC is free. It contains all the 28 high-quality BGM(.flac) in the game
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, English, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
